name: Hanoi Tower Challenge
description:
The tower of hanoi game consists in passing all the disks from tower 1 to tower 3

You can only move one disk at a time and you can not place one larger disk on top of another

Win and get 3 stars at all levels by finishing them with the least amount of moves.

Try to do them in the shortest possible time to appear in the Top 5 list.

Don't forget to share with your friends!
